unnormalised: **Decoding the Digital Jalebi: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Twist**
normalised: **Decoding the Digital Jalebi: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Twist**

unnormalised: Ever wondered what makes a reel go viral faster than a Rajdhani Express from Delhi to Mumbai? Well, folks, follower analytics are becoming the chai to our samosa – an absolute must-have in influencer marketing.
normalised: Ever wondered what makes a reel go viral faster than a Rajdhani Express from Delhi to Mumbai? Well, folks, follower analytics are becoming the chai to our samosa – an absolute must-have in influencer marketing.

unnormalised: Forget just counting likes! We’re talking deep dives. Who's engaging? Are they real people from Chennai or just bots from who-knows-where? Analytics tools now help identify audience demographics, interests, and even optimal posting times – like, is 15:00 hrs the best time to drop that dance video or will 11:00 hrs get more traction?
normalised: Forget just counting likes! We're talking deep dives. Who's engaging? Are they real people from Chennai or just bots from who-knows-where? Analytics tools now help identify audience demographics, interests, and even optimal posting times – like, is fifteen hundred hours the best time to drop that dance video or will eleven hundred hours get more traction?

unnormalised: Platforms are now offering granular data, letting influencers like Pooja Verma and Rohan Singh understand what's resonating with their audience in real-time. This is crucial for campaigns especially those happening around Diwali, 26/01/1950 or even next week.
normalised: Platforms are now offering granular data, letting influencers like Pooja Verma and Rohan Singh understand what's resonating with their audience in real-time. This is crucial for campaigns especially those happening around Diwali, twenty sixth january nineteen fifty or even next week.

unnormalised: Imagine customizing your content based on analytics which revealed most of your followers love Biryani! No more guesswork, just pure data-driven decisions! This also helps in filtering out fake followers, preventing loss of Rs. 5000 spent on collaborations. It's not just about reaching millions; it's about reaching the *right* millions.
normalised: Imagine customizing your content based on analytics which revealed most of your followers love Biryani! No more guesswork, just pure data-driven decisions! This also helps in filtering out fake followers, preventing loss of rupees five thousand spent on collaborations. It's not just about reaching millions; it's about reaching the *right* millions.

unnormalised: So, ditch the gup-shup and embrace the data, doston! Time to get analytical at 17:00 hrs today!
normalised: So, ditch the gup-shup and embrace the data, doston! Time to get analytical at seventeen hundred hours today!
